name: 6 Cupcakes
description: A box of six fluffy, frosted cupcakes in assorted flavors.

description: Rich and moist chocolate cake layered with silky ganache.

name: Milk Tart (Melktert)
description: Traditional South African custard tart with a hint of cinnamon.

name: Bento cake
description: Trendy mini cake perfect for personal celebrations or gifting.

name: Coconut Lamingtons (6)
description: Sponge cake squares coated in chocolate and rolled in coconut.

name: Banana Bread (Loaf)
description: Moist homemade banana bread with a golden crust.

name: Jam tarts (6)
description: Buttery tartlets filled with fruity jam and baked to perfection.

name: Scones with Jam & Cream (6)
description: Classic scones served with strawberry jam and whipped cream.

name: Artisanal bread
description: Handcrafted bread with a crunchy crust and soft interior.

name: Carrot Cake Slice
description: A slice of spiced carrot cake with creamy frosting.

name: Rolls (6)
description: Soft dinner rolls perfect for any meal or sandwich.

name: Birthday Cake (Decorated)
description: Celebration cake customized with colorful decorations.

name: Assorted Biscuits (500g)
description: A half-kilo mix of delicious home-style biscuits.

name: Bread
description: Freshly baked loaf perfect for toasting or sandwiches.

name: Croissants (Plain, 4 Pack)
description: Flaky, buttery croissants baked fresh every morning.
